text: Anant Public High School is a higher-secondary co-education private school in the Patiala city of Punjab, India. The school was founded in 1992 and is affiliated to the Central Board of Secondary Education of India. == References == Category:Co-educational schools in India Category:High schools and secondary schools in Patiala Category:Educational institutions established in 1992 Category:1992 establishments in India
title: Anant Public High School
